name: Rythm (MomoArt4)
description:
Rythm is a 2D endless runner based on music, visual feedbacks ; and most importantly, rythm!
You'll jump across platforms, following the beat, trying to go as far as you can.





MADE BY:
Gegout-Stover Louis
MODE-YAP Matthieu
PREVOST DE SAINT CYR Harold




INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:
1 - Download Rythm"
2 - Unzip the folder. 
3 - Open the folder. 
4 - Double click on the application named "Rythm.exe". 
5 - Enjoy and push your opponent !
